channel.title: Harper Insane on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Harper Insane on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: poor cubs
item.description: So last night I came home and hung out with matt.. then joanna and her friends from iowa city came and visited. we went to abril and hung out.. it was exciting cuz laura came.. I hadn’t seen her in years.. we all went back to my house and got ready to go to wrigley field.. we got on the train.. and found out the cubs lost.. and then found out that the shortstop screwed up.
